item.description: The Summit View Meetinghouse and Banquet Facility provides for a quaint and charming gathering spot along rte. 5 across the Connceticut River. On Friday evenings the Summit View holds free outdoor concerts at their Pavilion. From 5:30 to 8:30p.m. a BBQ buffet is provided. All food and drinks must be purchased on the premises. Concerts begin at 6:30p.m. Pat Colwell and the Soul Sensations rock their way into the new millenium with a powerful mix of robust music centered around classic rock and roll, bodacious renditions of the best soul music and blues, and a complete set of original tunes...a must for a cool summer night!!!
item.name: Free Outoor Concert: Soul Sensations
